CustomField.formula: IF(RecordTypeId == '0124N000000SiFo',HYPERLINK("/apex/GeneratePdfOnQuote?id=" &Id + '&type=marrs', IMAGE("/resource/Button_Generate_Quote_PDF", "Generate Quote As PDF"),"_self") ,HYPERLINK("/apex/GeneratePdfOnQuote?id=" &Id + '&type=quote', IMAGE("/resource/Button_Generate_Quote_PDF", "Generate Quote As PDF"),"_self"))
CustomField.label: Generate Quote
